items.summary: Remove all photo usage from the current single-page site and make the Valentine/proposal experience completely text-only (do not display any uploaded images, including IMG_5979.jpeg, and remove all references such as /assets/photos/IMG_3752.jpeg and /assets/photos/IMG_3753.jpeg).

Ensure the app renders a simple, cute, Valentine-themed single-page message for Ahana that is clearly from Suvo, keeping all user-facing text in English and aligning the layout/content with the earlier ‘first web’ Valentine style (hero + short love note/letter + reasons list + closing CTA).

Update the closing interaction copy to be Valentine-focused (e.g., “Ahana, will you be my Valentine?”) and keep the interaction simple (single-step or at most two steps) with an optional lightweight celebration effect that respects prefers-reduced-motion.
